english: He did not even bother to say thank you .
chinese: 他甚至连说一声谢谢都不肯。

english: Please accept our thanks to mr. jones and yourself .
I must remember to write and thank her .
chinese: 我一定得记住去写信谢谢她。

english: No more , thank you , i am full up .
chinese: 不添了，谢谢，我已经吃饱喝足了。

english: If you please, sir, might he have it ?
chinese: 谢谢你，先生，他可以收下吗？
谢谢造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Thank you。i dare say you mean very kind .
chinese: 谢谢你。你真是一番好意。

english: I thank you, sir, for all your courtesy .
I will thank you to mind your business .

chinese: 就是这些手续，办完了。谢谢。

english: He is better , thank you , doctor .
Yes . here we are . thank you .
chinese: 是的。七层楼到了，谢谢你。

english: Gee, thanks. i'm glad to get that straight .
chinese: 噢，谢谢。我真高兴把这事搞明白了。

english: Thank you, mr. president. i'm very honored .
chinese: 谢谢您，总统先生。我感到十分荣幸。

english: You were very good to come, father .
